line_1: And by a soft and pleasing Elegance,
line_2: The sweets of Artful Rhetorick t'advance,

line_1: In all the pomp of Latian elegance!
line_2: Behold fair Bath her stately front advance,

line_1: The sweetest child of Attic elegance:
line_2: With graceful step see Addison advance,

line_1: With careless Pride, and simple Elegance:
line_2: See how the Walls, in humble Form, advance,
